column4: hi I am making a custom live CD from scratch following the doc but it just supplies me with a terminal like  boot prompt not one like on the offical CD. How can I make on like on the official LiveCD?
hi I am making a custom live CD from scratch following the doc but it just supplies me with a terminal like  boot prompt not one like on the offical CD. How can I make on like on the official LiveCD?
This is what we used as a guide to make Zenix. https://help.ubuntu.com/community/LiveCDCustomization
and I am following: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/LiveCDCustomizationFromScratch
and as you can see isolinux.txt will only give me a terminal-espe boot prompt
you know how the official CD presents you with the boot prompt with options I want to do that on my CD which is made from the ground up
don't you mean isolinux.cfg ?
yes
sorry was thinking .cfg but typed .txt and didn't notice
I wouldn't be too sure off the top of my head.
but in that link I gave you, you download + extract the Ubuntu iso
I have seen it seems they link a lot of files to each other which makes it really confusing
what catagory should I ask?
General Help is the generic "catch all" forums.
thanks. I'll try there. Thanks for trying.
Development and Programming is a bit quieter though, but may have less eyes watching.
just don't cross-post - else I'll give you a warning ;-)
cross post?
create multiple threads in multiple subforums.
oh. would dev &  programing be more appropriate?
both are equally as good places in my opinion considering your question. General Help tends to be a bit more "faster moving" then the Development subforums though.
gen help it is then.
